channel.title: CVE Feed for Uber Technologies, Inc. -- UberEATS: Uber for Food Delivery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Uber Technologies, Inc. -- UberEATS: Uber for Food Delivery

item.title: CVE-2017-13104|2024-08-05T18:58:12.408Z -- uber%20technologies%2C%20inc. -- ubereats%3A%20uber%20for%20food%20delivery
item.description: Uber Technologies, Inc. UberEATS: Uber for Food Delivery, 1.108.10001, 2017-11-02, iOS application uses a hard-coded key for encryption. Data stored using this key can be decrypted by anyone able to access this key.
